org.pac4j.oauth.client

Class WechatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.IndirectClient<OAuth20Credentials,U>
          • org.pac4j.oauth.client.OAuth20Client<WechatProfile>
            • org.pac4j.oauth.client.WechatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client<OAuth20Credentials,WechatProfile>

    public class WechatClient
extends OAuth20Client<WechatProfile>

    This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in Tencent Wechat.

    It returns a WechatProfile.

    More info at: WeChat login development guide

    Since:
    3.1.0
    Author:
    zhangzhenli
